title: Power out
body: I sorry my power just went out and there is know way for me to reconnect please don't ban me.

replies.body:
You won't get banned for leaving one game, however it is possible you might be placed in a low priority queue.

Just so you know, LeaverBuster is an automated system and bans from leaverbuster can not be manually reversed so asking not to be banned on the forums won't help.

For more information on leaverbuster see [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) page.
